plot: Yves and Jeanne attend a remembrance service for their daughter who died in an accident. A young woman, Sandrine, bursts in during the ceremony: Yves saved her life a short while back when she tried to commit suicide.
title: Le ravissement
plot_es: Yves and Jeanne attend a remembrance service for their daughter who died in an accident. A young woman, Sandrine, bursts in during the ceremony: Yves saved her life a short while back when she tried to commit suicide.
plot_en: Yves and Jeanne attend a remembrance service for their daughter who died in an accident. A young woman, Sandrine, bursts in during the ceremony: Yves saved her life a short while back when she tried to commit suicide.
